title: Navette, late 18th century
markings: Three marks on stem: struck with image of shoe (or pair of shoes) in profile; small mark of oval outline, indecipherable; indecipherable mark.
description: Two elliptical metal plaques with slightly incurved ends, the outer surfaces enamelled opaque light blue and bordered by narrow pierced and chased gold bands; inner surfaces mother-of-pearl; gold stem.

tombstone.epitaph:
Navette, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Gold, enamel, mother-of-pearl. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1967-48-71.
